message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product for $11,500. This is an exceptional opportunity to secure such a valuable item at a slightly discounted rate.
Thanks for the offer, Alice.  I'm very interested in the product, but $11,500 is a bit too high for my budget. Would you consider $10,000?

Thank you for your interest, Bob. I appreciate your feedback. I am unable to match the price you've proposed, but I would like to offer you the product for $11,000. This is my best offer considering the value of the product.
I appreciate you working with me, Alice.  How about we meet in the middle at $10,500?
I understand your position, Bob. Considering the value of the product, I am willing to negotiate further. My best offer now stands at $10,750.
